QuestData.Title: A Handful of Magic Dust
QuestData.Description: I'm going to need dust, but not just any dust.$B$BThe royal teromoths that inhabit the forest nearby have a magical dust upon their wings, which they use to pacify those that hunt them. I can make use of that property of the dust to assuage the resistance that I am feeling from the arakkoa eyes you retrieved. This, in turn, will allow me to use them to find Deirom.$B$BI won't need much, perhaps half a dozen handfuls, or so.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 7 handfuls of Pacifying Dust for Andarl at the Allerian Stronghold.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Andarl at the Allerian Stronghold in Terokkar Forest.
